\w They|strong="H3588"\w* say, ‘\w Keep|strong="H6942"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* yourself; \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w me|strong="H5066"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w holier|strong="H6942"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*!’ \w Such|strong="H3605"\w* people \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* nostrils, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w burns|strong="H3344"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*.\f + \fr 65:17 \ft LXX a new heaven and a new earth; see also Isaiah 66:22 and Revelation 21:1.\f* \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w things|strong="H7223"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*.
